snippet: The downfall of Song Lin, former head of China Resources, has the trappings of a late-night drama, including accusations of illicit riches, extramarital sex and pictures taken in a bedroom.
abstract: The downfall of Song Lin, former head of China Resources, has the trappings of a late-night drama, including accusations of illicit riches, extramarital sex and pictures taken in a bedroom.

headline.main: Scandal Downs Chairman of a Top Chinese State Company

keywords.name: organizations
